data.title: What happened to Andrea Evans from One Life to Live show?
data.meta_description: Andrea Evans rose to fame in the '80s for her role in One Life to Live show. So, how did she die? Discover more details about the actor's cause of death here.
data.text:
Celebrity deaths receive significant media coverage, with news and social media platforms dedicating significant attention to the event. Such is the case with the death of Andrea Evans, a two-time Daytime Emmy nominated actress who rose to fame in the '80s, especially for her role as Tina Lord in One Life to Live.

Andrea Evans was a familiar name to fans of the famous American soap opera, One Life to Live, where she became a fan favourite for several years. However, Evans's presence on the show dwindled over time, and she eventually disappeared from the storyline.

Since then, fans have been wondering what happened to the personality. The speculations didn't stop until her death at 66 years was announced by Don Carroll as having suffered from cancer. What kind of cancer did Andrea Evans have?

Andrea Evans' profile summary

Full nameAndrea Lynn EvansAliasAndrea EvansGenderFemaleDate of birth18th Jun 1957Place of birthAurora, Illinois, USAZodiac signGeminiNationalityAmericanDate of death 9th, July, 2023( at 66yrs)Cause of deathCancerLocation of deathPasadena, California Marital statusMarriedPartnerSteve RodriguezChildrenDaughter-Kylie Rodriguez( 19yrs as of 2023)Hair colourCopper brownEye colourBlueHeight in cm165 Height in ft 5'5"EducationDegree in theatreCollegeWheaton CollegeProfessionActress, producerYears active1978-present

Early life

The late Andrea Lynn Evans was born on 18th June 1957 in Aurora, Illinois, USA. She was brought up by her parents, Robert E Evans and Audrey Evans, alongside her siblings. The personality attended a local high school in her hometown.

She appeared in several beauty pageants, regional theatres, and commercials in the 1970s and 80s. After high school graduation, Andrea enrolled at the University of Illinois at Urbana Champaign, where she studied and earned a degree in theatre.

Career

Andrea Evans was best known for starring as troubled teenager Tina on One Life to Live and as Patty Williams on The Young and the Restless. The actress was nominated for a Daytime Emmy Award for outstanding actress Ingenue in a drama series in 1988 for her performance as Tina.

Tina got her second Daytime Emmy Award for outstanding actress in the web series DeVanity in 2015. Her other prominent TV roles included Rebecca Hotchkiss on Passions and Patty Walker on The Bay. Andrea also appeared in other notable films like:

A Low Down Dirty Shame

Ice Cream Man

Hit List

She abruptly left One Life to Live in the 1990s to take a career break and largely stayed out of the public eye, making fans wonder what had happened and whether she was returning.

The personality told People that her experience with a stalker influenced her decision to leave OLTL. She reprised her role as Tina in 2008 with a guest appearance on One Life to Live.

Marriage and children

Before her death, Andrea was married for 25 years and had one daughter. Away from her busy on-screen work, she was an amazing wife. Who was Andrea Evans' husband? She was married to attorney Steve Rodriguez whom she wedded on 10th Feb 1998.

The American actress was hitched to actor Wayne Massey from 1981-1983 before marrying Steve. Andrea's ex-husband Donald Wayne Massey is known for his role as Johnny Drummond in One Life to Live.

Who was Andrea Evans' daughter? She was a doting mother to Kylie Lyn Rodriguez. Kylie was born on 9th May 2004 and was 19 when her mother died. Kylie was not their biological daughter, Rodriguez and Andrea adopted her.

What happened to Andrea Evans?

On 9th Jul 2023, the world lost a daytime television star, Andrea Evans. How did Andrea Evans die? The actress succumbed to lobular carcinoma, a condition she had been fighting for years. However, the details of how long she was battling lobular carcinoma are unavailable on public domains.

On 10th Jul 2023, Andrea's producer Don Carroll confirmed to People that the actress had passed away the previous day. Her fans and people closer to her, like Nick Leicht, family and friends, praised her as an outstanding actress, mother and wife.

Net worth

Andrea Evans' net worth before her death was an estimated $3 million. Her primary source of income was her acting career. She had not yet revealed the brand of cars she owns, properties or lands. She, however, resided in her home in Pasadena, CA, with her daughter and husband.

Andrea Evans' fast facts

Who is Andrea Evans? Andrea Evans was an American actress and producer who gained fame in the 1970s and 8os for acting in movies like The Bold and Beautiful.

What was Andrea Evans known for? Andrea Evans was known for her role as Tina Lord, the troubled teenager in the TV show One Life to Live.

Did Andrea Evans leave One Life to Live TV show? Yes. Andrea Evans took a break from the show for some years due to a scary stalking situation. However, she rejoined the cast in 2013.

When did Andrea Evans die? Andrea Evans died on 9th Jul 2023 at her home in Pasadena, California.

What did Andrea Evans succumb to? Andrea Evans was battling cancer for years which she lamentably died from.

Did Andrea Evans have children? Yes, Andrea Evans and her husband, Steve Rodriguez, adopted a daughter in 2004 called Kylie Lyn Rodriguez.

Did Andrea Evans date Smokey Robinson? No, Andrea Evans was not dating the musician but mentioned liking his song.

Who was Andrea Evans married to? Andrea Evans married an attorney, Steve Rodriguez, for 25 years (from 10th Feb 1998-2023).

Andrea Evans' biography - Wrapping up

Andrea Evans, the veteran daytime drama television star, had been fighting cancer but unfortunately succumbed to the disease on 9th July 2023 in Pasadena, California. The public reacted with grief and sent their saddened tributes to Andreaâ€™s family.

Tuko.co.ke shared an article about Kerry Katona's children. She is a well-known English TV personality and former vocalist. She has been on television shows such as Dancing on Ice, Celebrity Big Brother, and Celebs on the Farm.

Kerry Katona is known for her large brood of children. She once stated that she had trouble remembering her children's birthdays and had to look them up on the Internet. Kerry is the mother of five children from her three marriages.

Source: TUKO.co.ke
